name: synapse
description: Synapse - AI Developer Agent with LLM capabilities

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend && npm run copy:dist
scripts.build:frontend: cd dev-agent/frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.copy:dist: mkdir -p dist && cp -r dev-agent/frontend/dist dist/frontend && cp -r dev-agent/backend dist/backend && cp -r workspace dist/workspace && cp index.js main.js package.json dist/
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd dev-agent/frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../../monty && npm install
